readingSection.title: The Power of Colors in Our Lives
readingSection.text: Colors are more than just visual elementsâ€”they carry emotional, psychological, and cultural meanings that influence how we feel, think, and behave. Warm colors like red, orange, and yellow are often associated with energy, passion, and enthusiasm... (coloque o resto do texto aqui)

questions.questionText: According to the text, what is the primary role of colors in our lives?
options: They influence how we feel, think, and behave.
They are only visual elements without deeper meaning.
They are exclusively used in fashion and advertising.
Their main purpose is to show a person's financial status.
They only serve to make environments more beautiful.
questions.correctAnswer: They influence how we feel, think, and behave.
